galley.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The fire extinguishers are stored in the galley.
galley.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a long low Greek or Roman ship with sails which was rowed by slaves in the past
galley.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a tray used in the process of printing books etc which holds type
galley.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a sheet of paper on which a new book is printed, so that mistakes can be put right before it is divided into pages
